00055 joFresnel::joFresnel() : Iop() 
00056 {

00060         IOR = 1.6666f;

00065 void joFresnel::knobs(Knob_Callback f)

00068         Bool_knob( f, &falloff, "Output Blend Factor" );

00079 void joFresnel::_validate(bool for_real)
00080 {
00081         copy_info();
00082         input(1)->validate( for_real );
00083         input(2)->validate( for_real );
00084         input(3)->validate( for_real );
00085         input(4)->validate( for_real );
00086         if( IOR <= 0 || info_.is_constant() )
00087         {
00088                 set_out_channels(Mask_None);
00089                 return;
00090         }
00091         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00092         Format temp = info_.format();
00093         width = temp.width();
00094         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00095 }

00102         input(3)->request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00103         input(4)->request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);

00106 void joFresnel::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00107 {
00109         out.range( 0, width );
00111         Row in1(x, r);
00112         Row in2(x, r);
00113         Row in3(x, r);
00114         Row in4(x, r);
00115         Row in5(x, r);
00116 
00117         input(0)->get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00118         input(1)->get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00119         input(2)->get(y, x, r, channels, in3);
00120         input(3)->get(y, x, r, channels, in4);
00121         input(4)->get(y, x, r, channels, in5);
00123         foreach (z, channels) 
00124         {
00126                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00127                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00128                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00130                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00131                 {
00133                         Vector refl( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00134                         Vector refr( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index], in2[Chan_Blue][index]);
00135                         Vector N( in3[Chan_Red][index], in3[Chan_Green][index], in3[Chan_Blue][index]);
00136                         Vector I( in4[Chan_Red][index], in4[Chan_Green][index], in4[Chan_Blue][index]);
00137                         Vector R( in5[Chan_Red][index], in5[Chan_Green][index], in5[Chan_Blue][index]);
00138         
00140                         if( I.length() > 0.0001 )
00141                         {
00143                                 I.normalize();
00145                                 float refIndexT = IOR; //transmitted 
00146                                 float refIndexI = 1.0f; //incident 
00147                                 
00149                                 float cosT =  R.dot( N ); 
00150                                 float cosI =  I.dot( N ); 
00151                                 float indexTCosI = refIndexT * cosI; 
00152                                 float indexICosT = refIndexI * cosT; 
00153                                 float indexTCosT = refIndexT * cosT; 
00154                                 float indexICosI = refIndexI * cosI; 
00155                                 float rParal = ( indexTCosI - indexICosT ) / ( indexTCosI + indexICosT ); 
00156                                 float rPerp = ( indexICosI - indexTCosT ) / ( indexICosI + indexTCosT ); 
00157                                 float r = ( rParal * rParal + rPerp * rPerp ) / 2; 
00159                                 refr = refr * (1-r); 
00160 
00161                                 refl = refl * r; 
00163                                 Vector result = refr + refl;
00165                                 if( falloff )
00166                                 {
00167                                         outPixelsR[index] = r;
00168                                         outPixelsG[index] = r;
00169                                         outPixelsB[index] = r;
00170                                 }else
00171                                 {
00172                                         outPixelsR[index] = result.x;
00173                                         outPixelsG[index] = result.y;
00174                                         outPixelsB[index] = result.z;
00175                                 }
00176                         } else
00177                         {
00178                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00179                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00180                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00181                         }
00182                 }
00183                 
00184         }
00185 }
